revision.text: This category is for characters/locations/etc. that were abandoned or excluded from the final product. [[Category:Content]] [[Category:Non-Canon]]
This category is for galleries for [[Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir|''Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir'']]. [[Category:Content]]

This category lists '''stub articles''' on this wiki.
A stub is a short article that can be expanded with more information on a subject by any user. To mark an article as a "stub" add the code {{t|stub}} to the end of any article. [[Category:Site maintenance]] [[Category:Content]]

revision.comment: Protected "[[Category:Spoiler]]": To prevent vandalism from occuring (‎[edit=sysop] (indefinite) ‎[move=sysop] (indefinite))
revision.text:
This category is for articles containing major spoilers.
'''Use:''' Adding a page in this category hides the page and displays a dialog that asks the visitor if they want to risk seeing spoilers or not. If not, the page will remain hidden. If the visitor accepts, the foreground fades away and reveals the page. [[Category:Content]]
This is a category page for the English-language episode transcripts. [[Category:Content]]
This category is for places in ''[[Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir]].'' [[Category:Content]]
This category is for promotional things, including but not limited to videos, magazine articles, or posters. [[Category:Content]]

revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/Mari Bot|Mari Bot]] ([[User talk:Mari Bot|talk]]) to last version by DarkClaw3
revision.text: This page contains all of the comics based on the series ''[[Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir]]''. [[Category:Content]] [[Category:Books]]

This category contains [[Help:Disambiguation|disambiguation]] pages — navigational aids which list other pages that might otherwise share the same title. If an internal link referred you to one of these pages, you might want to go back and fix it to point directly to the intended page.
'''Pages may be included in this category by the addition of the template {{t|disambig}} just before the list of similarly-named pages.''' [[Category:Content]] [[Category:Site maintenance]]

This is the base category for '''templates'''. Templates should be placed in appropriate subcategories.
See [[Project:Templates]] for collated information on templates. [[Category:Content]] [[Category:Organization]]
Category for all of {{SITENAME}}'s regulations. [[Category:Content]]
This category is for the seasons of the [[Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir|show]]. [[Category:Content]]
<center>This category is for articles that have been featured on the [[w:c:miraculousladybug|homepage]] of the [[File:Wiki-wordmark.png|link=w:c:miraculousladybug]]</center> [[Category:Content]]

This category is for films in the ''Miraculous'' franchise. [[Category:Content]]
